title: Colette wa Shinu Koto ni Shita
original_name: コレットは死ぬことにした
sinopse: Colette, a girl who has been asking herself about the purpose of her being a doctor. One day, she decides to escape her duty, and falls right into a well, hoping to go to a different world. The moment she wakes up, she finds herself in the land of death.
